document_data.mainbody:
aztican bean stew was a staple of the Maztican cuisine.
These simple stews were cooked in clay pots over red fire coals. Its main ingredients were beans, tomatos, and peppers. The stew was served with mayzcakes â€“ another staple of the Maztican cuisine.
In the , Erixitl, The Chosen Daughter of Qotal, was kindly invited to share a hearty meal of mayzcakes and stew with mother Tzilla. The lone woman packed a satchel of mayzcakes and stew for Erixitls travel the following day as she departed Ulatos in attempt to stop the looming war between Ulatos and Amn.
